snippet: The Ukrainian city of Lviv withdrew its bid for the 2022 Winter Games, becoming the third contender, after Stockholm and Krakow, Poland, to drop out of the race.
abstract: Ukrainian city Lviv withdraws its bid for the 2022 Winter Games, becoming the third contender, after Stockholm and Krakow, Poland, to drop out of the race.
lead_paragraph: The Ukrainian city of Lviv withdrew its bid for the 2022 Winter Games, becoming the third contender, after Stockholm and Krakow, Poland, to drop out of the race.
